casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Robert Timothy Walston, Sr. No. 392PA13-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 24, 2015 Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, for Walston, Robert T. (Sr.). Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Womble, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 8th of May 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
